original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū vutthavassā āraññakesu senāsanesu viharanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū vuttha vassāḥ āraññakesu senāsanesu viharanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitun”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram antaraghare nikkhipitunti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū—“bhagavatā anuññātaṁ āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhu bhagavatā anuññātam āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena

original: tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitun”ti tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ
analyzed: tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram antaraghare nikkhipitunti tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññatara
cīvaram antara ghare nikkhipitvā atireka chārattam vippavasanti

original: Tāni cīvarāni nassantipi vinassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjanti.
analyzed: tāni cīvarāni nassanti pi vinassanti pi ḍayhanti pi undūrehi pi khajjanti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhū tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram antaraghare nikkhipitvā atireka chārattam vippavasissanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū te aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram antara ghare nikkhipitvā atireka chārattam vippavasanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma te bhikkhave moghapurisāḥ tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram antaraghare nikkhipitvā atireka chārattam vippavasissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Upavassaṁ kho pana kattikapuṇṇamaṁ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni
analyzed: upavassam kho pana kattikapuṇṇamam yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅka sammatāni

original: sappaṭibhayāni tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ
analyzed: sa paṭibhayāni tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharantaḥ ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇam cīvarāna

original: aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipeyya, siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo
analyzed: aññataram cīvaram antaraghare nikkhipeyya siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocid eva paccayo

original: Chārattaparamaṁ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: chāratta paramam tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena tatas ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam pācittiyan ti

original: Yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanānīti
analyzed: yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni iti

original: ārāme ārāmūpacāre corānaṁ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
analyzed: ārāme ārāma upacāre corānam niviṭṭha ukāsaḥ dissati bhutta ukāsaḥ dissati ṭhita ukāsaḥ dissati nisinna ukāsaḥ dissati nipanna ukāsaḥ dissati

original: ārāme ārāmūpacāre corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
analyzed: ārāme ārāma upacāre corehi manussāḥ hatāḥ dissanti viluttāḥ dissanti ākoṭitāḥ dissanti

original: saṅghāṭiṁ vā uttarāsaṅgaṁ vā antaravāsakaṁ vā.
analyzed: saṅghāṭim vā uttarāsaṅgam vā antaravāsakam vā

original: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāyāti
analyzed: siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocid eva paccayaḥ tena cīvarena vippavāsāya ati

original: Chārattaparamaṁ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbanti
analyzed: chāratta paramam tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbanti

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: idaṁ me, bhante, cīvaraṁ atirekachārattaṁ vippavutthaṁ, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ.
analyzed: idam me bhante cīvaram atireka chārattam vippavuttha aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiya
imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Atirekachāratte atirekasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: atireka chāratte atireka saññī vippavasati aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Atirekachāratte vematiko vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: atireka chāratte vematikaḥ vippavasati aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Atirekachāratte ūnakasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: atireka chāratte ūnaka saññī vippavasati aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: avilutte viluttasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: a vilutte vilutta saññī vippavasati aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Nissaggiyaṁ cīvaraṁ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: nissaggiyam cīvaram a nissajjitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
ūnaka chāratte atireka saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: chārattaṁ vippavasitvā puna gāmasīmaṁ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamati,
analyzed: chārattam vippavasitvā puna gāma sīmam okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamati

original: antochārattaṁ paccuddharati, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṁ gaṇhanti,
analyzed: antar ucchārattam paccuddharati vissajjeti nassati vinassati ḍayhati a chinditvā gaṇhanti vissāsam gaṇhanti
